arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned by AWS to this Device Fleet.

deviceFleetName.description: The name of the Device Fleet (must be unique).

enableIotRoleAlias.description: Whether to create an AWS IoT Role Alias during device fleet creation. The name of the role alias generated will match this pattern: "SageMakerEdge-{DeviceFleetName}".

outputConfig.description: Specifies details about the repository. see Output Config details below.

roleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that has access to AWS Internet of Things (IoT).

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
